name: Roll A Ball (Chr0n1cle)
description:
Hey everyone. I'm a complete newbie in Game Development but i always had an interested in games since i was a little kid. I made this simple game by following the "Roll A Ball" tutorial from Unity and adding my own touch to it so i decided to share it. Obviously there is a lot of features that could be added and improved but i decided to keep it small and simple for my first ever game so i can have a strong foundation :) it's not the greatest game ever but i like it and maybe you will too!

In this game you are a ball that has to collect pick ups and carefully avoiding the obstacles! If you reach the score then you progress to another level. It may sound easy but different picks up have different score points, and increase your speed so it's harder to move around!

Controlls:

W,A,S,D to move 

Left Mouse Button to click

R to restart
